item.description:
Join us for a celebration of epic proportions! The New England Liberty LOVE Fest is a celebration and opportunity for like minded people to educate, learn, inspire, and enjoy the best of the best in art and music.

* Liberty LOVE Conceptions has no affiliation to the Ron Paul for President Campaign or any delegates. We are here to promote the pursuit of Life, Liberty, Happiness and of course: LOVE! Please stay tuned for upcoming lectures, art auctions, and more great music.

Featured Artists include:
...Rebel Inc
Jordan Page
Tatiana Moroz
Heistclick
Chris Ross
Federal Crime
Leaders Led
Randy Robbins
Political Animals
Farmstand
Prince Vega
A Minor Revolution
Next to Nothing
Comatose
the Stilts
A Boy Named Sue

Featured speakers include:
Adam Kokesh(Adam vs. The Man/ DMT advocate ; )>)
Anthony Antonello Activist/Journalist/ Ron Paul Delegate)
Bruce Ray Riggs(dirtyunclesam.com and Liberty Candidate)
Carla Gericke(N.H. Free State Project)
Daniel Gordon(R.I. Rep. and author of anti-NDAA legislation)
Dave Kopacz(Red Pill Politics Show)
Doug Berge (R.I. Tenth Amendment Center)


Agenda 21 with Dave Kopacz
14th amendment with Bruce Ray Riggs and Chris Kairnes
Red Pill politics with Dave Kopacz and the MA-17 Delegates


Please go to http://www.libertylovefest.com/ for updates and upcoming events and buy tickets now.

LOVE,
CK
item.name: New England Liberty LOVE Fest II
